subject: That'll torque some jaws!
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I deleted as many files as I could from 2006, 2007, and 2008. Yahoo errored
out on me, so I'll have to continue later. The files sapce has to be
temporary only, you can't just dump files and leave them--for years.

Frank-S
